title: Quick Take: Paris Terror Attacks
description: The politics and policy ramifications of the November 14 terrorist attacks in Paris. This episode: Sam Sanders, campaign reporter; Scott Horsley, White House correspondent; Mara Liasson, national political correspondent. Find the team on Twitter @nprpolitics and at npr.org/politics.
